7.1.hd_quote: The capacity of the Self to insist that its authority is best.
7.1.behavioral_axis: Establishes firm direction; expects compliance to the pattern.

7.2.hd_quote: The capacity of the Self to lead when chosen.
7.2.behavioral_axis: Leads naturally once elected or invited.
7.2.shadow_axis: Feels superior once chosen; loses touch with base.

7.3.hd_quote: The rejection of any institutionalized order.
7.3.behavioral_axis: Tests structures; refuses roles that feel imposed.
7.3.shadow_axis: Alienates allies; chaos instead of reform.

7.4.hd_quote: The capacity of the Self to accept the judgment of others.
7.4.behavioral_axis: Steps down when the mandate ends; respects rule of law.

7.5.hd_quote: The commander isolated from his troops and obsessed with victory at any price.
7.5.behavioral_axis: Carries mass projections to lead in crisis.
7.5.shadow_axis: Withdraws when needed; isolates and loses loyalty.

7.6.hd_quote: The capacity of the Self through its role to communicate responsibility.
7.6.behavioral_axis: Shares power wisely; articulates roles and responsibilities.
